version_description:
Added compatibility with new version of Dash (0.13), improvements in the wallet and integration contacts to facilitate the sending of crypto.
We have added Dash to our wallet! Now you can receive, send and store your Dash safely. Includes InstantSend and DashText

You can now pay Bitpay invoices

You can also check all transactions made with your Bitcard. Take control of your spending without leaving the Bitnovo application

We have fixed an existing problem that occurred when sending a cryptocurrency from other apps.
We have fixed an existing problem that occurred when sending a cryptocurrency from other apps.
We have fixed an existing problem that occurred when sending a cryptocurrency from other apps.
We have added support for dark mode.
We have added support for iPad.
We have added support for iPad.
We have added support for iPad.

We are pleased to announce that in this new update we have added the "100% transparent Fees" feature for all cryptocurrency purchases and voucher redemption in Bitnovo.

From now on, when you make your transactions, you will be able to know in detail the amount of fees charged by Bitnovo, distributors or miners in the network. This way, you will be able to know the total amount that will reach your wallet before executing the transaction, so you can decide whether to make the exchange.

We hope you enjoy this new feature!

Estamos muy contentos de anunciar que en esta nueva actualización hemos incorporado la función “Comisiones 100% transparentes” para todas las compras de criptomonedas y canjes de cupones en Bitnovo.

Desde hoy en adelante, al momento de realizar tus transacciones, podrás conocer en detalle cuál será el monto de las comisiones que cobra Bitnovo, los distribuidores o los mineros de la red. Así, sabrás con exactitud cuál es el importe total que será depositado en tu billetera antes de ejecutar la operación, para que puedas decidir si hacer o no hacer el intercambio.

¡Esperamos que disfrutes esta nueva funcionalidad!
